'''''Mythlore'' 27''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol8/iss1/ Volume 8, Issue 1]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].
==Contents==

====Articles====

* Kotzin, Michael C. “C.S. Lewis and George MacDonald: The Silver Chair and the Princess Books.”
* Barkley, Christine. “Predictability and Wonder: Familiarity and Recovery in Tolkien's Works.”
* McClatchey, J. “Praise and Christian Unity in War in Heaven.”
* Kocher, Paul H. “Túrin Turambar.”
* Moss, Anita. “Crime and Punishment -Or Development- in Fairy Tales and Fantasy.”

==== Poetry ====

* Ellwood, Gracia Fay. “The World.”

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editor's Corner.
* GoodKnight, Glen and Harry J.N. Andruschak. A Mythlore Issue Index.
* Christopher, Joe R. An Inklings Bibliography (16).
* Ellwood, Gracia Fay. “Matters of Grave Import: Intend to Have Joy.”
* Speth, Lee. “Cavalier Treatment: More About Arthur Machen.”
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''Companion to Narnia.'' Paul F. Ford, foreword by Madeleine L'Engle, illustrated by Lordinda Bryan Cauley. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''VII - An Anglo-American Literary Review. Volume I.'' Dr. Barbara Reynolds, Dr. Clyde S. Kilby, and Dr. Beatrice Batson. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''Dorothy L. Sayers. A Pilgrim Soul.'' Nancy M. Tischler. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''A DARK HORN BLOWING''. Dahlov Ipcar. Reviewed by Thomas M. Egan.
